field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the ACL.

field.label: Name
field.help: Set the name for this ACL.

field.label: Network List
field.help: List of addresses and network prefixes, one address or prefix per line. Use a leading exclamation mark (!) for negation. These built in ACLs may also be used: any, none, localhost, and localnets. If more than one element in an ACL is found to match a given IP address or prefix, preference is given to the one that came first in the ACL definition.
